issue.message: Expecting an activity to have `android.intent.category.LEANBACK_LAUNCHER` intent filter
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background
Hardware feature `android.hardware.touchscreen` not explicitly marked as optional
Expecting `<uses-feature android:name="android.software.leanback" android:required="false" />` tag
A newer version of androidx.compose.ui:ui-tooling than 1.5.0-alpha01 is available: 1.5.0-alpha02
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter
Expecting `android:required="false"` for this hardware feature that may not be supported by all Chrome OS devices
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 27. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `MillicastManager` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak

Duplicate string value `Saved streams`, used in `saved_streams_button` and `saved_streams_screen_title`. Use `android:inputType` or `android:capitalize` to treat these as the same and avoid string duplication.

location.message: Duplicates value in `saved_streams_button` (case varies, but you can use `android:inputType` or `android:capitalize` in the presentation)

issue.message: One or more images in this project can be converted to the WebP format which typically results in smaller file sizes, even for lossless conversion
The application adaptive icon is missing a monochrome tag
Missing density variation folders in `src/main/res`: drawable-hdpi, drawable-mdpi, drawable-xxhdpi
